name: Mos Courier
upgrade_notice: Some of the bugs have been fixed
author: Md. Mostak Shahid

sections.description: A Courier plugin by Md. Mostak Shahid.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  • Upload the 'mos-courier' folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory or install via the WP admin panel
  • Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
  • That's it.
sections.faq:
What does this do?

It will make your business easy to manage.
